title: Archax
description: A 4.5-meter-tall, 3.5-ton pilotable mecha robot blending anime aesthetics with real-world engineering, offering dual operation modes.
fullDescription: Developed by Tokyo-based startup Tsubame Industries, Archax is a groundbreaking pilotable robot that brings the world of science fiction into reality. Standing at 4.5 meters tall and weighing 3.5 tons, Archax features a humanoid upper body with two arms and hands designed to mimic human movements. The robot offers two operation modes: an upright 'Robot Mode' and a 'Vehicle Mode' that allows it to travel at speeds of up to 10 km/h.
capabilities: Pilotable Cockpit: Comprehensive control interfaces for human operation
Dual Operation Modes: Versatile movement between Robot Mode and Vehicle Mode
Advanced Camera System: 360-degree visibility through 9-camera setup
applications: Entertainment: Exhibitions, theme parks, and promotional events
Research & Development: Testing platform for advanced robotics technologies

title: Tesla Optimus
description: Tesla Optimus is a humanoid robot designed to perform manual tasks, blending AI with robotics for future labor automation.
fullDescription: Tesla's Optimus (also known as the Tesla Bot) is a general-purpose humanoid robot under development by Tesla, Inc. It was unveiled by Elon Musk during Tesla's AI Day event in August 2021. Designed to handle tasks that are repetitive, dangerous, or boring for humans, Optimus aims to revolutionize industries by introducing an affordable, autonomous, and safe labor force.
capabilities: Mobility: Walking at a moderate pace, navigating complex environments
Dexterity: Manipulating objects, using tools, picking up delicate or heavy items
Perception: Understanding its environment via cameras and sensors
Safety: Designed with lightweight materials and limited physical power to minimize risk to humans
applications: Industrial: Assisting in manufacturing, warehouse logistics, and material handling
Domestic: Performing household chores, running errands
Commercial: Serving in retail, restaurants, and customer service roles
Healthcare: Supporting elderly or disabled individuals with daily activities

title: NEO Gamma
description: NEO Gamma is a humanoid robot designed for home assistance, offering tasks like cleaning and companionship with advanced AI capabilities.
fullDescription: NEO Gamma is a next-generation humanoid robot developed by 1X Technologies, specifically designed for home environments. Standing approximately 1.65 meters tall and weighing around 30 kilograms, NEO Gamma integrates advanced AI to perform household tasks, engage in natural conversations, and provide companionship.

specifications.Mobility: Natural human-like gait with the ability to squat, sit, and walk
specifications.Hands: Five-fingered hands capable of delicate object manipulation
specifications.AI Capabilities: Proprietary language model for natural conversation

capabilities: Household Chores: Performs tidying, deep cleaning, and home management tasks
Natural Conversation: Engages in conversations and provides companionship
Adaptive Learning: Learns and adapts to new tasks through reinforcement learning
Object Manipulation: Delicate handling of household items with five-fingered hands
applications: Home Assistance: Cleaning, organizing, and managing household tasks
Companionship: Engaging in conversations, providing emotional support, and tutoring
Elderly Care: Assistance with daily activities and social interaction
Educational Support: Tutoring and learning assistance for family members

videos.title: NEO Gamma - Home Assistant Robot Overview

title: CORLEO
description: CORLEO is a hydrogen-powered quadruped robot by Kawasaki, designed to revolutionize off-road transportation with AI and adaptive mobility.
fullDescription: CORLEO is an innovative quadruped robot developed by Kawasaki Heavy Industries, unveiled at the Osaka-Kansai Expo in April 2025. Combining Kawasaki's expertise in robotics and motorcycle engineering, CORLEO is designed as a rideable, hydrogen-powered robotic horse aimed at transforming off-road transportation.

specifications.Design: Quadruped structure resembling a robotic horse with motorcycle elements
specifications.Power Source: Hydrogen-fueled 150cc engine powering electric drive systems
specifications.Mobility: Four robotic legs with rubber hooves for navigating diverse terrains
specifications.Capacity: Designed to carry up to two riders
specifications.Emissions: Zero harmful emissions - only water vapor

capabilities: Terrain Navigation: Navigates complex terrains including grasslands, rocky areas, and rubble fields
Real-time Adaptation: Adjusts to rider's movements in real-time to maintain balance and stability
Eco-friendly Operation: Provides zero harmful emissions transportation with hydrogen power
Multi-rider Support: Designed to safely carry up to two riders simultaneously
applications: Transportation: Potential future alternative for off-road travel and exploration
Emergency Services: Could be adapted for search and rescue operations in challenging terrains
Recreational Use: Novel experience for adventure enthusiasts and tourists
Exhibitions and Demonstrations: Showcases advancements in robotics and sustainable transportation

title: Unitree B2-W
description: Unitree B2‑W is a rugged, wheeled-quadruped robot capable of 20 km/h all-terrain mobility, heavy payloads, and autonomous navigation.
fullDescription: The Unitree B2‑W is a hybrid quadruped robot from Unitree Robotics, combining legged agility with wheeled speed. Designed as an industrial/field-grade platform, it adapts to stairs, slopes, rough ground, and flat surfaces with seamless leg-wheel transformation. It's tailored for robust tasks such as inspection, logistics, rescue, and autonomous patrolling.

specifications.Stair Climbing: 20–25 cm continuous, up to 40 cm stepping

capabilities: Adaptive Locomotion: Seamlessly switches between wheels and legs for optimal performance
Terrain Resilience: Excellent balance on gravel, grass, stairs, inclines, and uneven ground
Obstacle Navigation: Capable of stair navigation and acrobatic maneuvers
Autonomous Operations: Equipped with mapping, path planning, OTA updates, and remote control
Heavy Lifting: Can carry over 40 kg while moving and support up to 120 kg statically
Environmental Durability: IP67 protection enables operation in harsh weather conditions
applications: Industrial Inspection: Patrol pipelines, power grids, and remote infrastructures
Logistics & Transport: Deliver goods across warehouses, farms, mines, or outdoor facilities
Emergency & Rescue: Navigate disaster zones, rubble, or steep terrain to support rescue teams
Research & Development: Versatile testbed for payload, sensor integrations, and navigation research
Security & Surveillance: Autonomous site monitoring with onboard LiDAR and cameras
Agricultural Operations: Field monitoring, crop inspection, and automated farming tasks
